title: Alignment
pickOne: **Good** - Perform your art to aid someone else.
**Neutral** - Avoid a conflict or defuse a tense situation.
**Chaotic** - Spur others to significant and unplanned decisive action.

title: Race
pickOne: Elf - When you **enter an important location** (your call) you can ask the GM for one fact from the history of that location.
Human - When you **first enter a civilized settlement** someone who respects the custom of hospitality to minstrels will take you in as their guest.

title: Arcane Art (+CHA)
description:
When you **weave a performance into a basic spell**, choose an ally and an effect:
- Heal 1d8 damage
- +1d4 forward to damage
- Their mind is shaken clear of one enchantment
- The next time someone successfully assists the target with aid, they get +2 instead of +1

Then roll+CHA.

outcomes.text: The ally gets the selected effect.
Your spell still works, but you draw unwanted attention or your magic reverberates to other targets affecting them as well, GM's choice.

title: Charming & Open
description:
When you **speak frankly with someone**, you can ask their player a question from the list below. They must answer it truthfully, then they may ask you a question from the list (which you must answer truthfully).
- Whom do you serve?
- What do you wish I would do?
- How can I get you to _______?
- What are you really feeling right now?
- What do you most desire?

title: Bardic Lore
description:
Choose an area of expertise:

When you **first encounter an important creature, location, or item** (your call) covered by your bardic lore you can ask the GM any one question about it; the GM will answer truthfully. The GM may then ask you what tale, song, or legend you heard that information in.
pickOne: Grand Histories of the Known World

title: A Port In The Storm
description: When you **return to a civilized settlement you've visited before**, tell the GM when you were last here. They'll tell you how it's changed since then.

title: Healing Song
description: When you **heal with Arcane Art**, you heal +1d8 damage.

title: Vicious Cacophony
description: When you **grant bonus damage with Arcane Art**, you grant an extra +1d4 damage.

title: It Goes To Eleven (+CHA)
description: When you **unleash a crazed performance** (a righteous lute solo or mighty brass blast, maybe) choose a target who can hear you and roll+CHA.

outcomes.text: The target attacks their nearest ally in range.
They attack their nearest ally, but you also draw their attention and ire.

title: Metal Hurlant (+CON)
description: When you **shout with great force or play a shattering note** choose a target and roll+CON.

outcomes.text: The target takes 1d10 damage and is deafened for a few minutes.
You still damage your target, but it's out of control: the GM will choose an additional target nearby.

title: A Little Help From My Friends
description: When you **successfully aid someone** you take **+1 forward** as well.

title: Eldritch Tones
description: Your **Arcane Art** is strong, allowing you to choose two effects instead of one.

title: Duelist's Parry
description: When you **Hack & Slash**, you take +1 armor forward.

title: Bamboozle
description: When you **parley with someone**, on a 7+ you also take **+1 forward** with them.

title: Multiclass Dabbler
description: Get one move from another class. Treat your level as one lower for choosing the move.

title: Multiclass Initiate
description: Get one move from another class. Treat your level as one lower for choosing the move.

title: Healing Chorus (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Healing Song**

When you **heal with Arcane Art**, you heal +2d8 damage.

title: Vicious Blast (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Vicious Cacophony**

When you **grant bonus damage with Arcane Art**, you grant an extra +2d4 damage.

title: Unforgettable Face (Requires level 6+)
description: When you **meet someone you've met before** (your call) after some time apart you take **+1 forward** against them.

title: Reputation (Requires level 6+)
description: When you **first meet someone who's heard songs about you**, roll+CHA.

outcomes.text: Tell the GM two things they've heard about you.
Tell the GM one thing they've heard, and the GM tells you one thing.

title: Eldritch Chord (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Eldritch Tones**

When you use **Arcane Art**, you choose two effects. You also get to choose one of those effects to double.

title: An Ear For Magic (Requires level 6+)
description: When you **hear an enemy cast a spell** the GM will tell you the name of the spell and its effects. Take **+1 forward** when acting on the answers.

title: Devious (Requires level 6+)
description: When you use **Charming & Open** you may also ask "How are you vulnerable to me?" Your subject may not ask this question of you.

title: Duelist's Block (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Duelist's Parry**

When you **Hack & Slash**, you take +2 armor forward.

title: Con (Requires level 6+)
description:
Replaces: **Bamboozle**

When you **parley with someone**, on a 7+ you also take **+1 forward** with them and get to ask their player one question which they must answer truthfully.

title: Multiclass Master (Requires level 6+)
description: Get a move from another class. Treat your level as one lower for choosing the move.
